Trade/Device Name(s): Greiner VACUETTE® Blood Collection Tube with Clot Activator and Gel Separator and Standard Stopper (16 x 100 mm, 8 mL)
Specimen Container(s): Greiner VACUETTE® Blood Collection Tube with Clot Activator and Gel Separator and Standard Stopper (16 x 100 mm, 8 mL)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Greiner VACUETTE® Blood Collection Tube with Clot Activator and Gel Separator and Standard Stopper for blood specimen collection and processing.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to collect, transport, and process blood for testing serum in the clinical laboratory; suitable for therapeutic drug monitoring (TDM).
